title: Wildest Dreams
description: Tiernan Morelli is ruthless, powerful, dangerously irresistible.And Bianca’s new guardian.He’s not a good man, but she is drawn to him in a way she’s never felt before. Little does she know Tiernan has plans for her, and she will submit to his dangerous temptation.“A dangerous romance that left me missing the characters long after I finished the book!” - Dani Rene, USA Today bestselling authorWILDEST DREAMS is a collection of two full length novels by bestselling author Giana Darling including DANGEROUS TEMPTATION and BEAUTIFUL NIGHTMARE.
author: Giana Darling
